text:
@senatemajldr @JudyWoodruff @NewsHour Mitch's TOP PRIORITY is protecting the wealthy!

"@SenateGOP want to grant liability protection to businesses as part of the next round of coronavirus relief."

So you can't sue your employer for an unsafe work environment!

 https://t.co/L5B8zGapc8
